name: Man Haunt
description:
In a world where naught remains but reality television, a new show emerges: 

Man Haunt: Live!

You are just one of a seemingly endless stream of doomed contestants tasked with navigating the gameshow's next-to-impossible challenges and be the first to claim its mysterious grand prize. But in order to do win, there's a choice...

Slay the monster, or become the monster?

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • J to Dash
  • K to attack

This is a Beginner's Jam #4 submission, made with a group of awesome volunteers: 

Artists :
Airborne_Manatee
Arix_Furette
Danilo
Oasi

Devs:
Mouse (Angelo Marney)
SmelJey

Level design:
Marndog

Sound Designers:
Aarrow
Actrician
Tyler

Writer:
SpagersHat

Special thanks to : Doober that helped with concepts and code, Big_Fox and Threat for game design feedback and ideas,  and everyone else that helped with ideas, suggestions or helped fix an issue.
